newsitem.title: USA: Alliant Techsystems in launch vehicle pact.
newsitem.headline: Alliant Techsystems in launch vehicle pact.

text.p: Alliant Techsystems Inc said it signed a memorandum of understanding with Space Systems/Loral to launch up to 10 commercial satellites on Alliant's proposed Evolved Expendable Launch Vehicle (EELV).
The agreement with Space Systems/Loral is for commercial EELV space launch services between 2002 and 2006.

The EELVs are being developed in support of a U.S. Air Force initiative to develop a new family of expendable launch vehicles. The EELV, which will be used to launch both commercial and military satellites, is planned to be operational by 2001.
